mapper.select: SELECT f.f_id, f.f_name, lf.lf_st_coin, img.f_img_url, brand.f_brand_name FROM Furniture f JOIN LLifeFurniture lf ON f.f_id = lf.f_id JOIN FurnitureImage img ON f.f_id = img.f_id JOIN FurnitureBrand brand ON f.f_brand_id = brand.f_brand_id WHERE lf.lf_sub_type = 0 AND img.f_img_seq = 0
